name: Agents Never Die
description:
Roll for Stealth, Stealth your Roll!

Rachel Might has been sent on a special mission through an enemy base operated by robotic guards. Her loadout? Three D20 dice. She’ll use these dice to move and open doors, but she will have to be careful how much she rolls. While Rachel’s movements don’t make a sound, rolling dice across concrete does. She’ll have to weigh her options, choose when and how many dice to roll, and get out of the base as fast as possible. With luck, this agent won’t die, she’ll just roll them.

(Works best in Google Chrome. Post your completion score in the comments!)

Controls:

Move (Within Rolled Distance): WASD

Space: Open Roll Menu / Roll when menu is open

Left click: Add dice to roll (Max of 3 per roll)

Right click: Remove dice from roll / Close Roll Menu
